fixes.name: T|F
fixes.solution_explanation: Mapped Tableau AVG([Sales]) to DAX AVERAGE('sample_-_superstore (1)'[Sales]) and preserved the IF logic. Used TRUE()/FALSE() for boolean literals. Returned as a measure because the expression uses an aggregation.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation uses an aggregation (AVG), so it should be created as a measure.
